mapper.insert: insert into user (username, age, gender,birthday, balance,register_time) values (#{username},#{age},#{gender},#{birthday},#{balance},#{registerTime})
mapper.update: update user set username = #{username}, age =#{age}, gender = #{gender}, birthday =#{birthday}, balance = #{balance}, register_time = #{registerTime} where id =#{id}
mapper.select: select id, username, age, gender, birthday, balance, register_time from user
select id, username, age, gender, birthday, balance, register_time from user where username=#{username}
select id, username, age, gender, birthday, balance, register_time from user where username like #{username}
select count(1) from user where age < #{age} and gender=#{gender}
